name: 2K HD Battery Doorbell Camera Wireless with Ring Chime, Smart Video Doorbell with Two-Way Talk, Secure Cloud Storage, AI Detection and Instant Alerts, Night Vision, Compatible with Alexa
short_description: Answer Without Opening the Door: Speak to visitors in real time with built-in two-way audio
2K Ultra HD Camera & Night Vision: Capture crystal-clear videos day and night for better home security

Reliable 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Only: Designed exclusively for 2.4GHz networks—offering better wall penetration and wider range for more consistent streaming. (5GHz not supported)
Compatible with iOS & Android — Manage everything from your phone

name: TECKNET Longest 1300 Feet Wireless Doorbell with RGB Alarm Lighting,Battery-Powered IP66 Waterproof Design,60+Chimes & 5-Level Volume for Home/Apartment/Classroom/Business,4.5-Year Battery Life,Black
short_description: 🔔【Portable Design & Versatile Use】 The wireless doorbell does not necessitate WiFi or power sockets. The receiver and transmitter can be positioned at your convenience and utilized as a pager. The receiver may be situated on a tabletop or kept in your bag as you prefer. Whether you're in the cellar, the garage, or the garden, you'll always be aware of your visitors.

🔔【36-Month Long Battery Life】This wireless doorbell comes equipped with a sleep function. After a few minutes of non-activity, the door chime kit enters sleep mode. Press any button to awaken the receiver. The receiver operates on 3 AA batteries (not provided) and can last for up to 36 months of daily usage, reducing the need for frequent battery replacements!

🔔【RGB Light Indicator Cordless Doorbell】The RGB light indicator on the battery-powered receiver flashes upon transmitter activation and receipt of a signal. The high-decibel 110 dB volume can alert those who are hearing impaired or elderly. You can silence the front door bell when no ringtone is needed and rely on the RGB light to visually notify you when someone is at the door.

🔔【60 Melodies, 5 Volume Levels & Memory Function】This outdoor waterproof wireless doorbell offers 60 selectable melodies, 5 adjustable volume levels ranging from 0dB to 110dB, and a silent mode to cater to your preferences. The memory function ensures that the cordless doorbell kit recalls the last chosen melody and volume setting, even in the event of a power outage.

🔔【1300feet Cordless Range】The TECKNET wireless doorbell boasts a working range of up to 1300feet in open spaces without disrupting other nearby cordless devices. A robust and stable radio signal ensures you'll never miss a visitor. Note: The provided transmitter contains batteries, whereas the receiver does not (Requires 3 AA batteries).

🔔【IP66 Waterproof & Dustproof】The wireless doorbell flaunts a stylish contemporary design, with superb materials that shield the doorbell push button from elevated temperatures and interference. The battery-operated front doorbell is waterproof up to IP66 and robust enough to withstand extreme environments. It maintains a wireless transmitter in wet weather conditions and operates in diverse climates from -4°F to 140°F.

🔔【 Life Time Support】Should you experience any issues while using the product, don't hesitate to reach out to our professional customer support team, and take advantage of TECKNET's 36-Month Warranty (Registration Required).

name: XTU Doorbell Camera Wireless No Subscription, 2K Video Doorbell with Chime, 2-way Audio, Instant Alert, Human Detection, Night Vision, 2.4G Wi-Fi, Works with Alexa and Google Assistant, Indoor Outdoor
short_description: Will this work with my Wi-Fi? XTU J10 doorbell camera requires a 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network and does not support 5GHz. Setup is simplified with Bluetooth-assisted pairing and video tutorials, typically taking under 3 minutes. For optimal performance, position your router close to the camera or use a Wi-Fi extender to avoid video delay or alert delay.

How long do I need to charge the Doorbell? Under laboratory environments, the doorbell camera wireless battery lasts up to 2 months with 20 daily triggers. Real-world usage varies depending on motion frequency and environmental factors. To extend battery life, adjust sensitivity to minimize non-essential alerts or narrow motion detection zones to focus on key areas. Avoid installing in high-traffic areas (e.g., facing sidewalks).

How is the 2K video quality? The door bell camera features a 2K HD camera with a 120° wide-angle lens, capturing crisp footage day and night. Enhanced night vision illuminates up to 33 feet, making this door camera essential for outdoor security. Renters will appreciate the no-drill installation options, including heavy-duty adhesive strips for smooth surfaces or corrosion-resistant screws for permanent mounting.

Too many false alarms? Customize motion sensitivity and detection zones on this doorbell camera to prioritize humans, pets, and vehicles while ignoring plants or insects. The AI algorithm learns patterns over time to reduce false alerts. For best results, avoid pointing the door bell camera toward busy streets or fans. Temporary sensitivity adjustments may improve accuracy during heavy rain or wind.

What storage options are available? The doorbell camera supports local storage via micro SD cards up to 128GB (not included) and offers optional cloud storage. Built-in two-way audio allows clear communication; supports siren and personalized 10-second voice messaging; APP encryption ensures secure data transmission and privacy protection.

Smart Home Integration & Family Sharing: This doorbell camera seamlessly connects with Alexa and Google Assistant. Grant access to family members through the app for shared monitoring. Our 24/7 service team provides support with responses within 24 hours. Assistance is available anytime, anywhere.

name: AOSU Doorbell Camera Wireless- Head-to-Toe View, Intelligent Package Detection, 2.4G WiFi Video Doorbell with Chime, Support Local Storage, Smart Human Detection, Works with Alexa and Google Assistant
short_description: Head-to-Toe Video: With a 170° ultra wide angle and 9:16 vertical view, the AOSU doorbell camera provides a complete view of your doorstep, from head to toe. Never miss a visitor or package again.
Protect Your Packages Without Subscription: The doorbell camera automatically detects packages at your door and sends you an instant alert. Rest assured that your deliveries are safe and secure.

Too Many Invalid Alerts? - Advanced human detection technology minimizes false alerts by focusing on detecting people, not animals or shadows. Receive timely notifications with clear pictures of actual visitors.
2K Full HD Clarity: Experience stunning 2K Full HD video that captures every detail. See who's at your door and what they're doing with exceptional clarity.

Quick Reply and Voice Changer: When you are busy, use the preset quick voice reply of the doorbell camera to the visitor. You can also use a voice changer to protect your privacy or scare off people with bad intentions.
Remote Control and Two-Way Voice: Communicate with visitors from anywhere using the AOSU doorbell camera's two-way voice function. Stay connected and in control of your home security.
Seamless Smart Home Integration: Connect the doorbell camera with Alexa or Google Assistant for hands-free control and real-time alerts. Enhance your home security ecosystem with ease.

Invest in Peace of Mind: The AOSU doorbell camera is the ultimate solution for comprehensive home security and convenience. Protect your family, packages, and property with confidence. Order yours today and experience the difference!
Connect the included chime so you can hear notifications when you are far away from the doorbell (only supported when connected with the included doorbell)
Note: The product will have a blue light ring during normal operation, and the product will automatically record event videos，please note that this product is only applicable to 2.4G Wi-Fi.

name: AVANTEK Wireless Doorbell, D-3G Waterproof Chime Kit Operating at Over 1300 Feet with 52 Melodies, 5 Volume Levels & LED Flash
short_description: PREMIUM TRANSMITTER: Uses a lithium battery that lasts 3 years; with an IP55 waterproof construction and operating temperature from -4°F (-20°C) to 140°F (60°C), this wireless doorbell is able to withstand strong winds or rainstorms
LONG WIRELESS RANGE: Delivers a long transmission distance of 1,300 ft (400 m) for full-home coverage and will not interfere with other devices

52 BEAUTIFUL MELODIES: An abundant selection of 52 melodious chimes allows you to choose the sound you prefer; 5 adjustable volume levels with a maximum volume of 115 dB make it suitable for the elderly or those with impaired hearing

MEMORY FUNCTION: This doorbell will remember your sound levels and tone settings in the event that the power goes out; once the power comes back on, the doorbell will automatically revert to the last settings

EASY TO SET UP: It’s fast and simple to install the doorbell on your wall using the included anchor plugs and screws, or adhesive pad; this doorbell system can be expanded to 2 transmitters and additional receivers for increased coverage

short_description: 1,300 Ft/400 M RADIO WIRELESS COVERAGE: the strong and stable wireless signal anti-interference with other devices in your or your neighbours' home, ensure that you're never to miss a visitor, even if you're a few rooms away or on another floor

55 CLEAR SOUNDS TO SELECT: The plug-in receiver offers rich and clear sound; 5 adjustable volume levels with a maximum volume of 110 dB; Different 55 melodies to meet various needs, the default is Ding Dong

EASY TO INSTALL & EXPANDABLE: wireless bell set can be easily installed by attaching the bell button to a wall without wiring; You could install it anywhere inside, for home, garden, office，store, mailbox etc.

name: Blink Video Doorbell (newest model) – Head-to-toe HD view, two-year battery life, and simple setup. Sync Module Core included – System (Black)
short_description: Video Doorbell is our second-generation smart security doorbell with up to two years of battery life, an expanded field of view, and improved security features for more peace of mind, no matter where you are.
Last longer with two-year battery life — Experience up to two years of continuous security coverage with three AA Energizer lithium batteries and a Blink Sync Module (both included).
See more at your door — Greet guests and watch packages get delivered, day and night, with head-to-toe HD view and infrared night vision. Use two-way talk to hear and speak through the Blink app.

Set up in minutes — Easily install wire-free or connect Video Doorbell to existing doorbell wiring. When wired, Video Doorbell will sound through your home. Without wiring, you can use your Blink Mini 2 camera (sold separately) as an indoor plug-in chime. You'll also get alerts on your Blink app with each doorbell press.

Always know who's there — As part of a Blink Subscription Plan (sold separately), get alerts whenever a person is detected and enjoy features like Blink Moments, which stitches together clips into a single video to save and share.
Save and share clips — Securely store your footage in the cloud with a free 30-day trial of a Blink Subscription Plan (sold separately).
Works with Alexa — Connect to an Alexa-enabled device to answer the front door, arm and disarm your smart home system, and more using your voice.

Includes one Video Doorbell with three AA Energizer lithium batteries, one Sync Module Core with one USB-C cable and indoor power adapter, a mounting kit (including screws and anchors), and a corner mount.

You can set silent mode and don't worry to disturb your sleeping baby. And bright LED flash is suitable for the elderly and hearing impaired. The door bell wireless set has a memory function that saves you time with selecting another melody after you turned it off by eliminating the need for resetting

Waterproof doorbell wireless - The door bells & chimes wireless is made of high-quality ABS material. wireless doorbell chime has strong IP55 waterproof and weatherproof protection, working temperature at -4°F - 140°F. You can be add as required, choose 2 button with 1 receiver or 1 button with 2 receivers or 2 buttons with 3 receiver sets, etc

Easy to Install - Installing and pairing according to the instructions, NO tools needed! All you had to do was plug in door bell ringer wireless to an outlet and adhere the remote push button to the wall via Double-sided tape or Screws-in
